translations: n.（处境、问题、事件等的）艰巨性，严重性；庞大，巨大；暴行，滔天罪行；凶暴，穷凶极恶；重要性

phrs.translation: 暴行, 巨大, 极恶, 庞大
极恶, 巨大, 暴行

sentences.sentence: I was numbed by the enormity of the responsibility.
sentences.translation: 我对责任的艰巨性感到不知所措。

sentences.sentence: The full enormity of the crime has not yet been revealed.
sentences.translation: 这一罪行的严重性还没有充分揭示出来。

sentences.sentence: It was not long before I realized the enormity of my faux pas.
sentences.translation: 没过多久我就发现了我有多么的失礼。
